title: Sausage and leek potato pie
ingredients: ['oil as needed', '6 good quality sausages, chopped', '2 large leeks, sliced', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '2 courgettes, chopped', '1 tin chopped tomatoes', '1 beef or chicken stock cube', '200ml red wine', '1 tablespoon mixed herbs', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch pepper', '4 medium potatoes', '2 sweet potatoes', 'milk as needed', 'butter as needed', '3 tablespoons creme fraiche']
